title: Ciborium Cover, 16th-17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, cotton
Technique: embroidered on taffeta
description: Conical shaped cover made in four sections, now partly ripped; cream white taffeta. Each section embroidered in gold thread with details in pink and green silk; stylized symmetrical flower pattern; each set edged with narrow pink fringe; lined with pink cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ciborium Cover, 16th-17th century.Medium: silk, metal, cotton
Technique: embroidered on taffeta. 1963-92-2.
